responses.rationale: This segment discusses recommendations to reduce future risk, not explicit calming language about current safety or control.
This segment reports a negative fact (fatality rate) without explicit calming language.
This segment reports negative facts (symptoms) without explicit calming language.
This segment reports a specific fact about a case symptom without explicit calming language.
This segment describes health recommendations/actions without explicit calming language.
Reports 'risks to the general public remain low' which is a bare low-risk statement, not an intensified low-risk evaluation or other explicit calming cue required by Q5.
